  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:leno_es_20070518_2_0050305</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>leno_es_20070518_2_0050305</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Sustantivos (nominalización)</string>
            <string language="en">Nouns (nominalization)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gegenstandswörter (Nominalisation)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Noms (nominalisation)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Substantivos (nominalization)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Nomi (nominalizzazione)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ουσιαστικά (nominalization)</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">La actividad presenta un ejercicio de sustantivación. De este modo, se propone, pues, un término no sustantivo (verbo, adjetivo o adverbio) y se procede mediante sustantivación.</string>
            <string language="en">The activity presents an exercise on nominalization. Therefore, it shows a term which is not a noun (a verb, adjective or adverb) and procedes to nominalize it.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Lengua Castellana y Literatura</string>
            <string language="en">Castilian and Literature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Sustantivos</string>
            <string language="en">Nouns</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Aktivität stellt eine Übung auf 
Nominalisation dar. Folglich stellt sie dar, daß eine 
Bezeichnung welches nicht ein Gegenstandswort ist (ein Verb, ein 
Adjektiv oder ein Adverb) und procedes es nominalize.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'activité présente un exercice sur la 
nominalisation. Par conséquent, elle montre que une limite ce 
qui n'est pas un nom (un verbe, un adjectif ou un adverbe) et les 
procedes nominalize le.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A atividade apresenta um exercício no 
nominalization. Conseqüentemente, mostra que um termo qual não
seja um substantivo (um verbo, um adjetivo ou um advérbio) e os 
procedes nominalize o.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'attività presenta un'esercitazione sulla 
nominalizzazione. Di conseguenza, mostra che un termine quale 
non è un nome (un verbo, un aggettivo o un avverbio) ed i procedes 
nominalize esso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η δραστηριότητα παρουσιάζει μια άσκηση 
nominalization. Επομένως, εμφανίζει έναν όρο που δεν 
είναι ένα ουσιαστικό (ένα ρήμα, ένα επίθετο ή ένα επίρρημα) 
και procedes για να το ορίσει.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Castilian und Literatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gegenstandswörter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Castillan et littérature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Noms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Castilian e literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Substantivos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Castilian e letteratura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Nomi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καστιλιάνος και λογοτεχνία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ουσιαστικά</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
